_header: Ale make many a man to stick at a briar
Subjects: ale; drinking, effects of; carols, convivial
_description: Of the effects of Ale — six quatrains (aaab) and two-line burden: ‘Doll thi ale doll doll thi ale dole / Ale mak many a mane to haue a doty poll’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Ale mak many a mane to styk at a brereAle mak many a mane to ly in
                    þe myere…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Ale mak many a mane to swere by god & alhalows& ale
                    mak many a mane to hang vpon þe galows
BodEngPoete1.Note:
Probably the same MS as the ‘Fitch’ MS of
                    Ipswich.
